concept.title: New features and enhancements in DITA 2.0
concept.shortdesc: DITA 2.0 includes new features and enhancements.

draft-comment.author: Kristen J Eberlein
draft-comment.p: The goal of this topic is to provide a high-level overview of new functionality in DITA 2.0. It should not delve deeply into technical details, but should instead focus on the benefit these changes offer to implementations. More of WHY the TC thought a change was beneficial rather than how it was implemented.

dlentry.dt: New element and processing for rendering key-based variable text

dlentry.dd: The chunking feature has been simplified. The chunk attribute now takes only two tokens: combine and split. This supports the two most critical use cases for chunking: the ability to combine many documents into a single document, and the ability to split a single document into many documents.
